channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Highway crash injures 8 Southern California firefighters
item.description: Authorities say eight firefighters have been injured in a severe highway crash involving a fire truck in Southern California.

item.title: Takeaways from APâ€™s story on the role of the West in widespread fraud with South Korean adoptions
item.description: Western governments ignored widespread fraud in South Korean adoptions and sometimes pressured the country to keep the kids coming, an investigation led by The Associated Press has found.

item.title: Western nations were desperate for Korean babies. Now many adoptees believe they were stolen
item.description: Western governments ignored widespread fraud in South Korean adoptions and sometimes pressured the country to keep the kids coming, an investigation led by The Associated Press has found.
